name: Nim Dev Container
postCreateCommand: curl https://nim-lang.org/choosenim/init.sh -sSf | sh -s -- -y && curl -L https://github.com/nim-lang/langserver/releases/download/v1.12.0/nimlangserver-linux-amd64.tar.gz | tar -xz -C ~/.nimble/bin && curl -L https://github.com/arnetheduck/nph/releases/download/v0.6.1/nph-linux_x64.tar.gz | tar -xz -C ~/.nimble/bin
